title: "Disney Ambassador Hotel" art deco display face
content:
A friend of mine recently stayed at the Ambassador Hotel at Tokyo Disney Resort. They use an interesting art deco typeface for their identity. I'd never seen anything quite like it and wasn't sure if it was custom. Anyone recognize it?   
   
 ![Disney Ambassador Hotel](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419152837im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/26471.gif)
author: gargoyle
